titles.title: Protecting Americans from Drug Marketing Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny the deduction for advertising and promotional expenses for prescription pharmaceuticals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 11/2/2009--Introduced. Protecting Americans from Drug Marketing Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny a business expense tax deduction for expenses relating to advertising or promoting the sale and use of prescription pharmaceuticals.
